title: 小心睇路 Qantas 退款個 Flight credits 好L伏

replies.msg:
今日打左去Qantas傾 我發覺依間公司真係撚屌公司來

我張飛2019年9月買 原本諗住佢要求2020年9月30日前出到飛就可以
咁我覺得合理既 咪當訂定2021年旅行囉
The flight credit must be redeemed by 30 September 2020 or within 12 months of the date that the original ticket was issued, whichever date is later. The change fee will be waived.

點知打上去 佢話唔係 係要你2020年9月30日前飛完
得番果半年時間 仲未計武漢肺炎分分鐘玩到六七月 咁我飛賓州阿?

咁要求退錢啦 你都飛唔L到啦 即係唔關我事啦
Qantas has announced it will be cancelling all international flights between the end of March and the end of May, with domestic services slashed to 60 per cent of current flights.

佢話唔得 因為班機唔係真係CANCEL
一係你就同我對賭 賭4月尾真係無果班機 咁我就可以俾你FULL REFUND
如果唔係到時你硬食2400退款手續費

咁巴打可能會問 咁你4月尾先決定退唔退咪得囉
都唔得 所有退款一定要3月31號前決定 否則一律當你唔退款
Cancellations must be processed by 31 March 2020.


人地UO做LCC都肯全數退款啦 屌你老母QANTAS

must be redeemed by 30 September 2020 or within 12 months of the date

一年呀，唔識英文？
佢計你買飛日 + 1 年或者 9 月 30日，邊個遲d 就邊個 deadline

with a lower value than the credit voucher value

replies.msg: 其實用credit book full refund ticket 再refund又得唔得呢？

Important information about your flight

Qantas has announced further network changes in response to Coronavirus and various government travel restrictions.

As a result, your upcoming flight has been cancelled and the value of your ticket stored in credit. You will receive a second email this week with the details of your credit voucher, which will outline the options available to you. Click here for more information regarding the Australian Consumer Law.

As we are experiencing long wait times, please reconsider your need to contact us at this time.

We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused.
嘩 家陣你取消都要唔俾我退錢?

From today, anyone holding a Qantas ticket for travel before 31 July 2020 can get a flight credit and retain the full value of their booking. You need to do this by 30 April 2020. The flight credit is valid for booking and travel by 31 December 2021. This gives you more than 18 months to plan, rebook and travel.

If you already have a Qantas flight credit issued on or after 31 January 2020, this will also be automatically extended but may take a few weeks to update in our system.

No change fees apply when rebooking but please note that the flight credit can only be used towards a fare of equal or higher value than the original fare you purchased.

Find out more about flight credits and your options here.

Our call centres are under significant pressure responding to the rapidly evolving travel situation. We thank you for your patience, and ask that you avoid calling unless you're due to travel in the next 48 hours.

Alternatively, you can wait until we make the changes. If your flight is affected, we will contact you as soon as possible with your options.
轉左POLICY
搞掂曬 打左去CS 全數退款 六至八星期入番落CREDIT CARD戶口
